title: Washington to talk to Tehran , Donald Trump says

# Trump says he is planning to talk to Iran

## “We have a lot of very big, very powerful ships sailing to Iran right now, and it would be great if we didn't have to use them,” Trump told reporters Thursday at the Kennedy Center.

![Illustrative image of US President Donald Trump and Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.](https://images.jpost.com/image/upload/f_auto,fl_lossy/q_auto/c_fill,g_faces:center,h_720,w_1280/703854)Illustrative image of US President Donald Trump and Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.(photo credit: Curtis Means/Pool via REUTERS, Office of the Iranian Supreme Leader/WANA/Reuters, REUTERS/DADO RUVIC/ILLUSTRATION)ByREUTERS, [SAM HALPERN](https://www.jpost.com/author/sam-halpern), [JAMES GENN](https://www.jpost.com/author/james-genn)JANUARY 30, 2026 02:54Updated: JANUARY 30, 2026 03:07

US President Donald Trump on Thursday said he was planning to talk to Iran amid rising tensions.
